name: Donut Bakery Maker
description:
This is great opportunity to show people in town ... That best donuts are sold only at Donut Bakery Maker Game 2016
you will have different options for making your own flavor with different topping and then decorate it.

at the end you can also enjoy eating your own donut.

Hope you will enjoy the games and support us so we can keep on coming with new games daily.

Thanks
